block.p: AGCO CORP., Duluth, Ga., named Donald R. Millard senior vice president and chief financial officer. He had been president and chief executive at Matria Healthcare.

PERKIN ELMER, Boston, named Stephen P. DeFalco, vice president and general manager at its analytical instruments business, to the posts of senior vice president and president at its instruments business. He succeeds Bob Rosenthal, who resigned.
AGCO CORP., Duluth, Ga., named Donald R. Millard senior vice president and chief financial officer. He had been president and chief executive at Matria Healthcare.

PERKIN ELMER, Boston, named Stephen P. DeFalco, vice president and general manager at its analytical instruments business, to the posts of senior vice president and president at its instruments business. He succeeds Bob Rosenthal, who resigned.

PHAR-MOR, Youngstown, Ohio, named Martin S. Seekely, controller, to the post of chief financial officer. Mr. Seekely, who also continues as vice president, succeeds Sankar Krishnan, who left the company in June.
REPUBLIC SERVICES, Fort Lauderdale, Fla., named Jim O'Connor, chief executive, to the posts of president and chief operating officer. He succeeds Jim Cosman, who plans to resign.

UNO RESTAURANT CORP., Boston, named Paul W. MacPhail executive vice president and chief operating officer, seven months after he resigned from those posts. He is now succeeding Dennis J. Roberts, who is leaving to pursue other interests.
